channel.title: Py Humble Games
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle Games bundles!

item.title: Destiny 2: The Story So Far
item.content:encoded:
Guardians! Add this epic bundle to your loadout in preparation for The Final Shape, Destiny 2’s upcoming expansion that will mark the conclusion of the Light and Darkness Saga. Included is the last five years' worth of expansion content* released for Destiny 2, giving you everything you need, with plenty of time, to level up ahead of The Final Shape’s release this Summer. You’ll get:

  • Destiny 2: Lightfall and the Annual Pass 
  • Destiny 2: The Witch Queen
  • Destiny 2: Beyond Light

And more! Whether your service to the Light is just beginning, or you’re an errant Guardian looking to return to the fight, this is the perfect opportunity to get the whole Destiny 2 experience in one bundle. Your purchase will help support the Bungie Foundation.

*Customers must download the free edition of Destiny 2 on Steam in order to redeem the keys for expansion content.

item.title: Mind-Bending Masterpieces
item.content:encoded: Engage in the more cerebral part of gaming with this bundle of outstanding puzzle games, which includes some of the most ingeniously designed titles of recent years. In the award-winning Patrick’s Parabox, you’ll expand your perception of geometry, space, and recursion as you puzzle out how to fit boxes within boxes within boxes, ad infinitum. Manifold Garden has you solving physics-defying conundrums in a striking Escher-esque world of infinite architecture. Superliminal tasks you with escaping a mind-bending dream world where depth and perception don’t behave as you’d expect. Pay what you want for 7 mind-bending masterpieces and help support the Global FoodBanking Network with your purchase!

item.title: Mega Man Franchise Pack
item.content:encoded: Dust off your side-scrolling skills and dive into some of the best 2D games ever created with this massive collection of Mega Man games! A substantial chunk of the Blue Bomber’s storied history is at your fingertips, starting with Mega Man Legacy Collection 1 and 2, which compiles all the mainline titles. You’ll also get Legacy Collections for the Mega Man X and Mega Man Zero and ZX series, plus the standalone Mega Man 11. It adds up to a total of 25 games across 36 years of Mega Man! Pay what you want for this bundle of essential gaming, and help support JDRF with your purchase.

item.title: Exceptional Indie Allies
item.description: Honor Black history with indie hits
item.content:encoded: Celebrate Black History Month with this bundle of critically acclaimed and award-winning indie games, in support of NPower’s mission to create pathways for prosperity for veterans and young adults from underserved communities. You’ll get Endling - Extinction is Forever, where you take on the role of the last mother fox on Earth who must make sure that her pups thrive and survive in a hostile world. In the resonant point & click adventure Norco, you’ll explore a surreal and intimate rendition of Southern Louisiana in search of answers to a multigenerational mystery. Wytchwood invites you to a dark fairytale world where you’ll concoct witchy brews, battle wits with monsters, and pass judgment on the unvirtuous. Pay what you want for these and more—a total of 7 games—and help support NPower’s critical work!

item.title: Controller'd Chaos
item.content:encoded: You’re going to want to pick up your controller for this bundle, jam-packed with high-octane action that will test your twitch reflexes! In Maneater, you’ll assume the role of a fierce bull shark as you navigate an open world, evolve your abilities, and seek revenge against the vile fisherman who has wronged you. No More Heroes, by the inimitable video game auteur Suda51, casts you as an upstart assassin in a wild quest to hack and slash your way up the hierarchy of hired killers. Get all these games and more–a total of 7 awesome titles–and help support charity with your purchase.

item.title: With Soulslike These... You Need Enemies
item.description: Brutal Soulslikes to test your might
item.content:encoded: Take on steep challenges and reap the rewards of mastery in this bundle of epic Soulslike adventures! Shoot and slash, and explore your way through a twisted interdimensional post-apocalypse in Remnant: From the Ashes. Engage in thrilling, kinetic, and skill-testing hand-to-hand combat and take in the otherwordly wonders in Clash: Artifacts of Chaos. Help the valiant king of the rats fight off brutal frog invaders in the stunning hand-drawn 2D adventure Tails of Iron. Pay what you want for all these games and more, and help support buildOn with your purchase!
